sub_fields.label: Section style
sub_fields.name: section_style
sub_fields.instructions: Click here to see an example of the different styles.

choices.text_left: Text on the left and image on the right
choices.text_right: Text on the right and image on the left

sub_fields.label: Overlay Text
sub_fields.name: overlay_text
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) Add text overlaid on the image.

sub_fields.label: Notice
sub_fields.name: notice
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) Display some text beneath the title

sub_fields.label: Mobile Image
sub_fields.name: mobile_image
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) Add an image to be used on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Crop image?
sub_fields.name: crop_image
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box if using a jpeg, or any image without a transparent background.
